5WV.SI.summary: AsiaPhos Limited, an investment holding company, manufactures, sells, and trades in phosphate-based chemical products in the People's Republic of China, Singapore, India, the United States, and internationally. The company offers yellow phosphorus, sodium tripolyphosphate, sodium trimetaphosphate, sodium hexametaphosphate, trisodium phosphate, tetra-sodium pyrophosphate, tetrapotassium pyrophosphate, sodium acid pyrophosphate, disodium phosphate, monosodium phosphate, and Phosphoric Acid. It is also involved in the general wholesale trade and trading of chemicals; and provision of Internet technology consulting and transportation services. AsiaPhos Limited was founded in 1996 and is based in Singapore.

6JA.F.long_name: St. Augustine Gold and Copper Limited
6JA.F.summary: St. Augustine Gold and Copper Limited, a mineral exploration company, engages in the acquisition, exploration, and evaluation of mineral properties in the Philippines. It holds interests in the King-king copper-gold project that covers an area of approximately 1,548 hectares located in the Province of Compostela Valley, Mindanao Island. The company is headquartered in Singapore.

7JV.F.summary: Silkroad Nickel Ltd., together with its subsidiaries, engages in the exploration, mining, production, and sale of nickel ore. The company's nickel mining concession area consists of approximately 1,301 hectares in the Morowali Regency, Central Sulawesi, Indonesia. Silkroad Nickel Ltd. was incorporated in 2005 and is headquartered in Singapore. Silkroad Nickel Ltd. is a subsidiary of Far East Mining Pte. Ltd.

AJY.AX.summary: Asaplus Resources Limited, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the exploration, mining, and marketing of iron ores. The company operates through Mining, and Trading and Consulting Service segments. Its principal project is the Silverstone project located in Datian County, China, as well as holds an interest in Beikeng mine. It also trades in copper strips; and provides consulting services. Asaplus Resources Limited was incorporated in 2012 and is based in Singapore.

ASO.SG.summary: AsiaPhos Limited, an investment holding company, manufactures, sells, and trades in phosphate-based chemical products in the People's Republic of China, Singapore, India, the United States, and internationally. The company offers yellow phosphorus, sodium tripolyphosphate, sodium trimetaphosphate, sodium hexametaphosphate, trisodium phosphate, tetra-sodium pyrophosphate, tetrapotassium pyrophosphate, sodium acid pyrophosphate, disodium phosphate, monosodium phosphate, and Phosphoric Acid. It is also involved in the general wholesale trade and trading of chemicals; and provision of Internet technology consulting and transportation services. AsiaPhos Limited was founded in 1996 and is based in Singapore.

OMH.AX.summary: OM Holdings Limited, an investment holding company, engages in mining, smelting, trading, and marketing manganese ores and ferroalloys. The company operates through Mining, Smelting, and Marketing and Trading segments. It owns and operates Bootu Creek manganese ore mine that is located in the Northern territory of Australia. The company also provides manganese ferroalloys, ferrosilicon, and manganese sinter ore. In addition, it trades in manganese ore, manganese ferroalloys, ferrosilicon, sinter ore, chrome ore, and iron ore. The company has operations in the Asia Pacific, Europe, the Middle East, Africa, and internationally. OM Holdings Limited was founded in 1993 and is headquartered in Singapore.

RTLGF.long_name: St. Augustine Gold and Copper Limited
RTLGF.short_name: ST AUGUSTINE GOLD AND COPPER LT
RTLGF.summary: St. Augustine Gold and Copper Limited, a mineral exploration company, engages in the acquisition, exploration, and evaluation of mineral properties in the Philippines. It holds interests in the King-king copper-gold project that covers an area of approximately 1,548 hectares located in the Province of Compostela Valley, Mindanao Island. The company is headquartered in Singapore.

S20.SI.summary: The Straits Trading Company Limited, an investment company, has stakes in real estate, hospitality, and resources businesses. It operates through Resources, Real Estate, and Hospitality segments. The company engages in the smelting of tin concentrates and tin bearing materials. It also produces various grades of refined tin metal and by-products; and invests in other metals and mineral resources. In addition, the company invests in, develops, leases, and sells real estate properties; provides property and real estate fund management services; and owns and manages hotels. It has operations in Singapore, Malaysia, Japan, Australia, and China. The company was founded in 1887 and is headquartered in Singapore. The Straits Trading Company Limited is a subsidiary of The Cairns Pte. Ltd.

SAU.TO.long_name: St. Augustine Gold and Copper Limited
SAU.TO.short_name: ST AUGUSTINE GOLD AND COPPER LT
SAU.TO.summary: St. Augustine Gold and Copper Limited, a mineral exploration company, engages in the acquisition, exploration, and evaluation of mineral properties in the Philippines. It holds interests in the King-king copper-gold project that covers an area of approximately 1,548 hectares located in the Province of Compostela Valley, Mindanao Island. The company is headquartered in Singapore.

Silkroad Nickel Ltd. was incorporated in 2005 and is headquartered in Singapore. Silkroad Nickel Ltd. is a subsidiary of Far East Mining Pte. Ltd.

It also produces various grades of refined tin metal and by-products; and invests in other metals and mineral resources. In addition, the company invests in, develops, leases, and sells real estate properties; provides property and real estate fund management services; and owns and manages hotels. It has operations in Singapore, Malaysia, Japan, Australia, and China. The company was founded in 1887 and is headquartered in Singapore. The Straits Trading Company Limited is a subsidiary of The Cairns Pte. Ltd.
